Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 23rd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2017...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Seattle on 3/2/2018 (Going to SEA: 3B Jiovanni Mier, C Tony Kemp, SS Dawel Lugo. Going to PIT: P Alfonso Olivo, RF Carlos Peguero)...
Injured on 4/7/2019 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/18/2019 with a Bruised Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/11/2021 with a Bruised Finger, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/18/2021 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Traded from Seattle to Miami on 2/3/2022 (Going to SEA: C Tucker Barnhart. Going to MIA: C Tony Kemp)...
Traded from Miami to San Francisco on 7/31/2022 (Going to SF: C Tony Kemp, P Edward McLaren, C Hank Conger. Going to MIA: C Buster Posey)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2023, off Raul Alcantara (LAD)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2023, off Raul Alcantara (LAD)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2023, hitting .667 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
1/31/2028: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,000,000 through salary arbitration...
8/1/2028: Signed a contract extension with San Francisco, $1,500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2028...
1/31/2029: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,000,000 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 5/29/2030 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
